message: Hello Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $15000. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12000. Can you consider it?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While I understand your perspective, $12000 is a little low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $14000 to make this deal work. What do you think?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13500? I'm willing to make a compromise to make this deal work.
